title: Back to school Apple sale: deals on iPads, MacBooks, AirPods, Apple Watch, and more
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Back to school deals on Apple's best-selling devices
article: The 2021 back to school sale season is in full swing, and if you're looking to snag a deal on one of Apple's best-selling devices, then you've come to the right place. We're rounding up the best back to school Apple deals that are happening online, including discounts on iPads, MacBooks, AirPods, the Apple Watch, and more.

Some highlighted offers include the best-selling AirPods Pro in stock and on sale for $197 (was $249), a massive $80 discount on the Apple Watch 6, and the luxurious AirPods Max on sale for a new all-time low price of $477.80. If you're a student looking for a laptop or tablet deal, Amazon has record-low prices on the 10.2-inch iPad, which is on sale for just $299.99 (was $329), and the powerful MacBook Air marked down to $899 (was $999). See more of the top back to school Apple sales below, and keep in mind, these are limited-time offers, so we recommend taking advantage now before it's too late.
